Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    jm.constants.Alignments, jm.constants.DrumMap, jm.constants.Durations, jm.constants.Dynamics, jm.constants.Frequencies, jm.constants.Noises, jm.constants.Panning, jm.constants.Pitches, jm.constants.ProgramChanges, jm.constants.RhythmValues, jm.constants.Scales, jm.constants.Tunings, jm.constants.Volumes, jm.constants.Waveforms, jm.JMC

    public final class Model
extends java.lang.Object
implements jm.JMC
    Model of the System. Contains the action of placing a note in the composition (environment), the functions that perceive the environment, and the composition GUI window.
    Author:
    braem

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init()
        Method to initialize the class. Creates the phrases, parts, and score with some initial notes. Opens the Composition view.

      • placeNote

        static boolean placeNote(int agentID,
                         java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> vertNotes,
                         java.util.List<java.lang.Double> vertPositions,
                         double position,
                         boolean isUser,
                         jm.music.data.Note userNote)
        Main action of the agents; places a note in the composition. Also used by user to add a note.
        Parameters:
        agentID - ID of the agent calling this action.
        vertNotes - Notes vertical to the agent.
        vertPositions - Positions of notes vertical to the agent.
        position - Position of the agent.
        isUser - Whether or not the user is adding this note.
        userNote - The note the user wants to add. Unused if isUser is false.
        Returns:
        true if the agent successfully places the note. false otherwise.

      • selectNextNote

        static int selectNextNote(int agentID,
                          int horiz,
                          int vertical,
                          boolean ahead)
        Agent's algorithm to select the next note. 1. Select a sounding to target 2. Find part bounds based on agentID 3. Find a note that fits the target sounding and some other music theory rules using the part bounds.
        Parameters:
        agentID - ID of the agent executing the algorithm.
        horiz - The past note.
        vertical - The note vertical to the agents current position.
        ahead - Whether or not this agent is ahead of all other agents.
        Returns:
        The selected note to be placed.

      • getPastNotes

        static java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getPastNotes(int agentID)
        Gets the past notes in an agents part. This is the perception of the agent of the environment. Perception length is Parameters.PERCEPT_LENGTH. Perception length is defined in terms of time instead of array size.
        Parameters:
        agentID - ID of the agent
        Returns:
        The list of past notes in the percept length

      • getPastPositions

        static java.util.List<java.lang.Double> getPastPositions(int agentID)
        Gets the past positions of notes in an agents part. This is the perception of the agent of the environment. Perception length is Parameters.PERCEPT_LENGTH. Perception length is defined in terms of time instead of array size.
        Parameters:
        agentID - ID of the agent
        Returns:
        The list of past positions in the percept length

      • writeToMIDI

        static void writeToMIDI()
        Writes the composition to a MIDI file.

      • reverseParts

        private static jm.music.data.Part[] reverseParts()
        Helper function to writeToMIDI(). Reversing puts the soprano part at the top and bass at the bottom in the MIDI file.
        Returns:
        Reversed this.parts array.

      • chooseDuration

        private static double chooseDuration(int agentID)
        Probabilistically selects a duration for a agentID using algorithm in ProbabilisticSelectionAlgorithm.java.
        Parameters:
        agentID - ID of the agent running this
        Returns:
        selected duration value

      • getNoteAtCurrentTime

        private static int getNoteAtCurrentTime(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> vertNotes,
                                        java.util.List<java.lang.Double> vertPositions,
                                        double position)
        Gets the note occurring at the agents position.
        Parameters:
        vertNotes - Notes vertical to the agent.
        vertPositions - Position of notes vertical to the agent.
        position - Position of the agent.
        Returns:
        The note occurring at the position of the agent.

      • isAhead

        private static boolean isAhead(java.util.List<java.lang.Double> vertPositions,
                               double position)
        Figures out whether an agent is too far ahead, meaning that the other agents are lagging.
        Parameters:
        vertPositions - Positions of notes vertical to the agent.
        position - Position of the agent.
        Returns:
        true if the agent is ahead of all notes vertical to it. false otherwise.

      • getInterval

        private static int getInterval(int lower,
                               int upper)
        Calculates the interval ID of two notes.
        Parameters:
        lower - Lower note.
        upper - Upper note.
        Returns:
        Interval ID of lower by upper note.

      • getDistance

        private static int getDistance(int n1,
                               int n2)
        Calculates the distance between two notes.
        Parameters:
        n1 - Note 1.
        n2 - Note 2.
        Returns:
        Absolute value of the difference of the notes.

      • getSounding

        private static Sounding getSounding(int intervalID)
        Gets the associated sounding of an interval ID.
        Parameters:
        intervalID - ID of the interval.
        Returns:
        Sounding of the interval ID.

      • getPartBounds

        private static int[] getPartBounds(int agentID)
        Returns the bounds of the part of an agent.
        Parameters:
        agentID - ID of the agent (part ID).
        Returns:
        An array of size 2 where the first element is the lower bound and the second element is the upper bound.

        private static void openView()
        Opens the view of the composition.

        Returns the phrase associated to the agent ID.
        Parameters:
        agent - The ID of the agent
        Returns:
        The associated phrase of the agent.
